macro.name: PORT1
macro.description: Serial COM Port

macro.name: BAUD1
macro.description: port baud rate (default: 9600)

macro.name: BITS1
macro.description: port data bits (default: 8)

macro.name: PARITY1
macro.description: port parity (default: none)

macro.name: STOP1
macro.description: port stop bits (default: 1)

macro.name: OEOS1
macro.description: output end of line separator (default: \\r\\n)

macro.name: IEOS1
macro.description: input end of line separator (default: \\r\\n)

macro.name: AMPSTOGAUSS1
macro.description: Amps to Gauss conversion factor or empty string for no calibration (default: '')

macro.name: SP_AT_STARTUP1
macro.description: Apply last setpoints at startup (default NO)

macro.name: ADDR1
macro.description: ADDRress of device in daisy chain

macro.name: MAX_VOLTAGE1
macro.description: Maximum voltage of this power supply

macro.name: MAX_CURRENT1
macro.description: Maximum current of this power supply

macro.name: READ_OFFSET1
macro.description: Read offset, in Amps, to apply to readings from this power supply (Default: 0)

macro.name: WRITE_OFFSET1
macro.description: Write offset, in Amps, to apply to setpoints to this power supply (Default: 0)
